categories.name: ‚öñÔ∏è Legal & Regulatory
categories.description: How to structure Loop to stay compliant while enabling the vision

features.title: Closed Loop = No Securities Issue
features.description: If trading gains can't convert to USD, strong argument it's 'rewards optimization' not investing. Key defensive structure.

features.title: Rewards Framing
features.description: It's not 'investing' - it's 'optimizing your rewards'. Language matters for regulatory posture.

features.title: Regulation CF Path
features.description: If we want real USD-convertible merchant investments, Reg CF allows non-accredited investors. $5M/year cap, SEC registration required.

features.title: State Fintech Sandboxes
features.description: AZ, WY, UT have sandboxes for fintech innovation. Could test features with regulatory cover.

features.title: Non-US Launch First
features.description: Launch full features in crypto-friendly jurisdiction (UAE, Singapore). Geo-fence US users initially.
features.impact: Faster to market, prove model first

features.title: Securities Lawyer Engagement
features.description: Before any trading features go live, need formal legal opinion on structure.
